sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Disable "Location Tracking on Service Portal". A system property "glide.service_portal.disable_location_tracker" is to hide location tracking pop-up on Service portal widgets</description>
        <name>Hide Location Tracker Pop-up on SP</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var propertyName = "glide.service_portal.disable_location_tracker";
if (!gs.getProperty(propertyName)) {
    var propertyDescription = "This property is to hide location pop-up on the Service Portal landing page and disable location tracking for analytics purposes";
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
    gr.setValue("name", propertyName);
    gr.setValue("description", propertyDescription);
    gr.setValue("type", "string");
    gr.setValue("value", "true");
    gr.insert();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-11-25 04:51:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6b473a775be060105b1eed35cc81c707</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Hide Location Tracker Pop-up on SP</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">3c3878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37f0b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6b473a775be060105b1eed35cc81c707</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-11-25 04:51:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Hide Location Tracker Pop-up on SP
